p: Coronavirus pandemic-19 (COVIDâ€‘19) is an ongoing disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS-CoV-2). According to the WHO latest report, 3,442,234 are confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infected people including 239,740 deaths. Among the six WHO regions, the largest number of cases has been reported from Europe (1,544,145) followed by Americas (1,433,756), Eastern Mediterranean (211,555), Western Pacific (152,774), South-East Asia (68,756), and Africa (30,536) (WHO COVID-19 Dashboard, n.d.). Since it was first identified in December 2019, COVID-19 has infected a large population of people around the world (Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) Situation Report-35, n.d.).
